nodes.text: The Lexas systems were a group of star systems that included the Lexas Prime system, a part of the Outer Rim Territories' Kessel sector. At some point by 2 ABY, several petty crimelords operated in the Lexas systems. The Krish smuggler Karalan worked for the crimelords but became progressively more indebted to them. After Karalan lost his starship and was almost killed by a bounty hunter, the Krish instead became a member of the Mytaranor Slaving Council.
The Lexas systems were mentioned in Alliance Intelligence Reports, a 1995 sourcebook for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game.
